title: (x) Origen XBox 360 viral campaign - Magritte {Mark S, Simon}
content:
Blessings of the Masses  
Blessings of the State  
.  
.  
.

Respect In Kind to the Typographic Intelligent Individuals here in these hallowed forums.

I wish to ask for your help in identifying an new unknown.

The following link is to a new VIRAL marketing campaign site for the upcoming Microsoft Game Console.

There are surely very few instances in which the VIDEOGAME industry has done anything of typographical note;

however please take note of the COUNTDOWN CLOCK NUMERALS in the background of this page :

[http://www.origenxbox360.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080306071751/http:/www.origenxbox360.com/ "http://www.origenxbox360.com/")

: : : : : : :

Might anyone be able to positively ID what typeface is in use ?

It’s reminiscent of a classic form but updated with a polygonal composition.

.  
.  
.

PLEASE LEND YOUR EXPERT OPINIONS + SUPPORT

\_ \_ \_ \_ \_ \_ \_ \_ \_ \_ \_ \_ \_ \_ \_

YOUNG PRAE,

Aerosyn-Lex M.

PEACE BE WITH YOU

 [‹ Book Cover type](http://web.archive.org/web/20080306071751/http:/typophile.com/node/15009 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) A&E show "Inked" - ITC Benguiat {Yves} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080306071751/http:/typophile.com/node/15004 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Aerosyn-Lex Mes...

comments.content: . : : : S A N G R E . P A G A . P A R A . S A N G R E : : : .

Hmm. Seems to be modified version of [Bauer Bodoni](http://web.archive.org/web/20080306071751/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/bauer-bodoni/italic/testdrive.html?s=1234567890&p=72). Ball terminals removed, a serif removed here and there, roughen up with a filter, and you’ve got it.
BTW, that site makes me think of the first Cyan title, “The Manhole.” (Same people who did “Myst.”)

Thanks for the reply Mark .  
.  
.

I’m thinking as the typeface is being used in a flash script it must be a FONT

rather than a treated version of BODONI . it certainly looks like it may be a variant

of BAUER BODONI; but I would suppose that is indeed a font.

Any other suggestions : : :

I’ll keep looking . My Thanks

.

aerosyn.lex

. : : : S A N G R E . P A G A . P A R A . S A N G R E : : : .

Well, I did a sneaky thing: I downloaded the swf and imported it into Flash. Of course, it tells me the font is missing, but it does tell me the name: Magritte. No idea where it’s from, though. It didn’t show up in any of the major font vendor sites. Could be a custom font.

Great Minds Think Alike .  
.  
.

I hopped onto my PC and used the SOTHINK decompiler to as well dl the SWF .

I noticed the same thing . MAGRITTE . but I could find no trace of it online .

.

I was interested in seeing what the rest of the character set would look like

but unfortunately I may never now .

.

thanks for your help MARK .

.

best blessings .

lex
